column1: '''"The Eagles are Coming!"''' is the fifty-fourth scene of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'' and the sixty-ninth scene of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (extended edition)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King'' (extended edition)]]. It was extended in the latter edition.
